title: Kent State Researchers Use Digital Devices to Dispense Medications Safely (Kent State University)
text: ( Source : Kent State University ) Organizing prescription medications in a traditional pill dispenser is not effective enough when patients are taking up to 20 different drugs seven to nine times a day. Not taking the medication at the right
